fields.description:
When open Base UI Table View does not display first row and scroll wont help to make that row visible, it bounces back, what makes it impossible to tap on it.
Tap on  a different row and return to Base UI again will solve this problem.
It is a *regression* compare to iOS 6.X

Test steps:
1. Install and run KitchenSink
2. Tap Base UI

Actual result:
"Tab Groups" row is not visible 

Expeced:
It should be visible  or accessible
fields.summary: iOS7: Base UI - wrong table view frame
fields.environment:
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.1.1.201306131423
Titanium SDK, build: 3.1.1GA
iPhone 5 iOS 7.0
Xcode5
CLI 3.1.1
KitchenSink Version: 3.1.1.GA
